channel.title: Bing-Shiun Tsai | Bioit Station (BITS) | Academia Sinica

item.title: A Night of Reunions and Connections
item.description:
One lab group photo over delicious duck dinner â€” good luck, Jeff! Wishing you all the best on your new path.

We were also delighted to welcome back è© æ™´ for a visit, and wish her all the best as she heads to the U.S. for her new chapter.

item.title: Old Caoling Tunnel Biking
item.description:
A delightful lunch and a warm welcome to Serina!

Group photo in front of Fulong Train Station â€” weâ€™re about to start our bike ride!

Another shot at the entrance of the Old Caoling Tunnel â€” little did we know we would end up completing the entire cycling route! In the end, we made it all the way around.

item.title: Okinawa APBJC 2024 Conference
item.description:
Group photo in front of the restaurant with friends from other labs after the conference.

Another group shot taken inside the restaurant.

Late-night chats at the lodging â€” this conference trip will be a lifelong memory.

item.title: Birthday Party 2024
item.description:
We gathered to celebrate Dr.Tsai’s birthday â€” a joyful moment for the whole lab.

May this year bring even more success, health, and happiness. Happy birthday!

item.title: Laser War! - Lab activity
item.description:
It was a fun-filled afternoon full of strategy, team spirit, and (just a little) chaos. Whether you were a sniper or just running for your life, everyone had a blast.

Thanks to all the teammates for the laughter, friendly competition, and unforgettable memories. Looking forward to the next battle!

item.title: Conquer the Mountains - Lab Outing
item.description:
Finally reached the summit â€” great job, everyone!

A group photo after the descent â€” we were all completely exhausted.

Group shot at the restaurant.

This hiking trip was a real challenge â€” no doubt weâ€™ll all be sore tomorrow! ðŸ˜†
